comment.author: 25453448@N02
comment._content: Looking NW down the pass with Honister Crag on L. Some of the trails high up on the left are to do with the Honister slate mines. Honister slate is a beautiful greyish-green slate of volcanic origin (Ordovician water-reworked ash with amazing patterns and structures in it, when polished). The quarries can be seen on the left skyline.

comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: Nice. Added to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honister_Pass Thanks for posting these!
